name: linux distributions prepared for pcduino
short_description:
BETA ONLY FOR NOW

distribution images for different use, with updated kernel that supports iptables.

Installation via dd or win32diskimager. at least 2gb scmicro card is needed. 

still under heavy development, use at your own risk. The kernel is stable but less configured.

The main target is a minimal system, but it should be working out of the upgradable out of the box, to what the user desire.

iptables works out of the box.

PLEASE HAVE A LOOK AT ALL FILES. THERE IS A DOWNLOAD SECTION FOR COMPLETE IMAGES AND TWO DIFFERENT FOR THE uImage AND TARBALL. IF YOU DONT USE THE IMAGES YOU NEED KERNEL AND TARBALL, TO MAKE THINGS WORK PROPERLY
summary: distribution images that work out of the box for PcDuino
